name: SingStar Mic
description:
SingStar is the all new version of the classic party game only on PlayStation®. Revamped and updated, the game sports a fresh new look, new songs, new features and is compatible with the unique SingStar Mic app. For more details on SingStar, check out SingStar.com
The application can be used in the following languages:
Brazilian Portuguese, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, French, German, Italian, Mexican Spanish, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish


PlayStation Mobile Inc.
